description: Total purchased electricity from the local grid (utility)
prompt: Enter the total electricity consumed (in kWh) each month from your utility provider.

conflict_log: Type: No conflict. All sources must-have.
Cadence: No conflict. All sources monthly.
Unit: No conflict. All sources kWh.

description: Total water usage from municipal supply (or other sources) in operations
prompt: Enter the total water consumed (in cubic meters) each month.

conflict_log: Type: No conflict. All sources must-have.
Cadence: No conflict. All sources monthly.
Unit: No conflict. All sources m³.

description: Total chilled water energy consumed from a district cooling utility provider.
prompt: Enter the total district cooling energy consumed (in RT-h) each month from your utility provider.

conflict_log: Type: No conflict. Both sources conditional.
Cadence: No conflict. Both sources monthly.
Unit: No conflict. Both sources RT-h.

description: Amount of liquefied petroleum gas (propane/LPG) consumed, e.g., for cooking or heating
prompt: Enter the total LPG (propane) consumed (in kg) in the period.

conflict_log: Type: No conflict. Both sources conditional.
Cadence: No conflict. Both sources monthly.
Unit: No conflict. Both sources kg.

description: Total amount of non-hazardous solid waste generated (municipal/general waste)
prompt: Enter the total quantity of general (non-hazardous) waste generated (kg) for the period.

conflict_log: Type: No conflict. All sources must-have.

description: Amount of non-hazardous waste diverted from landfill to recycling (subset of total waste)

conflict_log: Type: No conflict. Both sources conditional.

description: Liters of gasoline (petrol) fuel consumed by company-owned vehicles (cars, vans, etc.)

description: Liters of diesel fuel consumed by company-owned vehicles (trucks, heavy vehicles, or diesel cars)

conflict_log: Type: No conflict. Both sources conditional.

description: Quantity of refrigerant gases (e.g. HFCs) that are refilled or leaked from HVAC/Refrigeration systems
prompt: Enter the total amount of refrigerant (kg) added or leaked in the reporting period (by type, if possible).

conflict_log: Type: No conflict. Both sources conditional.
Cadence: Conflict Detected. UAE-ESG-GENERIC was 'annual', DUBAI-SUSTAINABLE-TOURISM was 'monthly'. Resolution: Set to 'monthly' (most frequent).
Unit: No conflict. Both sources kg.
